name: The Symposium
description:
Game Overview

According to Greek mythology, humans were once creatures with four legs, arms, and two heads. Zeus feared the creatures - their power of love too intimidating to his rule. So, one day, he tore them in twain. The creatures that resulted in his rage are known as humans. This is why we tread the planet in search of our soulmate - because once we are joined, we hold great power - we are better together! 

In this game - find your significant other in an ambitious plot to kill Zeus. 

User Interface

WASD - movement 

Left Ctrl - switch characters (stars) 

J - switch scene 

Space - shoot
